head.title: COVID -19 Information Page – Emergency Procedures – Forest Grove SD 15

meta.name: description
meta.content: Forest Grove SD 15 serves students and is located in Forest Grove, OR.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Our District nursing team has been working closely with Washington County Public Health to ensure there is accurate and up-to-date information available to people about the virus, and are currently working on putting more specific preventative and response plans in place should the virus emerge in our area. We will share information as it becomes available.

span.a: Talking With Children: TIPS FOR CAREGIVERS, PARENTS, AND TEACHERS DURING INFECTIOUS DISEASE OUTBREAKS
Cómo hablar con los niños: CONSEJOS PARA LOS CUIDADORES, PADRES Y MAESTROS DURANTE UN BROTE DE UNA ENFERMEDAD CONTAGIOSA

a.span: Just for Kids: A Comic Exploring The New Coronavirus

div.span: If you are in a crisis and need to talk to a mental health professional, please access these resources that are available to you:

br.style: font-size: large; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
font-size: large; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

span.span:
Si usted está en una crisis y necesita hablar con un profesional de salud mental, por favor de accesar estos recursos que están disponibles para usted:
- Hawthorne Walk In Clinic: www.hawthornewalkincenter.com
- Nation Suicide Prevention Lifeline: 1-800-273-8255
- 24 horas Línea de Crisis del Condado de Washington: 503-291-9111

div.span: (Tom McCall) 1728 Main St, Forest Grove, OR 97116

br.span: (Gales Creek) 9125 NW Sargent Rd., Gales Creek, OR 97117

div.div: Forest Grove SD 15 © new Date().getFullYear()>2010&&document.write(new Date().getFullYear());, All Rights Reserved.
